summary: BPENB is designed for balanced gameplay and not just for taking pretty screenshots. A simple ENB config painstakingly tweaked to give you ultimate balance and playability. No matter what environment you find yourself in the land of Skyrim BPENB will never take away from your gaming experience.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]A Balanced and Playable ENB [/heading]

[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg542/scaled.php?server=542&filename=zsetgiantmamwatch.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
This simple ENB setup has all the features of other popular configurations such as SSAO, SSIL and DoF but what sets this config aside is that this ENB has been painstakingly tweaked specifically for gameplay and not just for taking screenshots. You will find yourself in many different situations and environments while travelling Skyrim and with this ENB your game will look beautiful wherever you go and will never take away from your gaming experience with too much contrast, extreme brightness, unnatural colors or an over stylized look. It must be seen to be believed so don\'t just judge by the pretty screenshots, load up these settings and take them for a spin!

[color=red]SCROLL DOWN FOR INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS[/color]

[center][heading][size=+2][color=yellow][u]Features:[/u][/color][/size][/heading][/center]

[center][b]High performance and effective SSAO[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg217/scaled.php?server=217&filename=zzorcded.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]Natural light and color balance[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg846/scaled.php?server=846&filename=zzseen1.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]Natural looking skin tones[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg37/scaled.php?server=37&filename=zrealskin10.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]Godrays[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg266/scaled.php?server=266&filename=zgodrays2.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]Realistic dark nights (bring a torch!)[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg692/scaled.php?server=692&filename=zriftnitetorchwalk.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]Subtle depth of field[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg853/scaled.php?server=853&filename=znitemagicfote.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]Amazing Sunrises[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg838/scaled.php?server=838&filename=zfarmplanthoe2.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]Beautiful sunets[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg687/scaled.php?server=687&filename=zsetgiantmam.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]Complex SSIL (notice color reflection from the forge on the wood)[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg207/scaled.php?server=207&filename=zssil.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b]High detail shadows[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg571/scaled.php?server=571&filename=znitemagic2.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][b] Atmospheric dungeons[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg528/scaled.php?server=528&filename=zdungeonreadyfite.jpg&res=landing[/img][/center]
[center][heading][size=+2][color=red][u]INSTALLATION:[/u][/color][/size][/heading][/center]
[list=1]
[*]Uninstall or backup any previous versions of ENB
[*]Download and install ENBSeries v0.113 for TES Skyrim from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0113.htm]HERE[/url] -note: to download the zip you must click on the arrow pointing down on the download page :)
[*]Open up your SkyrimPrefs.ini and set \'bFloatPointRenderTarget=1\' if not already done
[*]Do NOTdownload with the download manager! Manually download BPENBv1.rar and copy contents into your main Skyrim NOT the data folder
[*][color=yellow]OPTIONAL:[/color]Copy contents of the optional files folder if you choose to use the Performance option of if you want to remove the Letterbox(black bars) effect. *note performance option will disable SSAO and DoF
[*][color=yellow]SUGGESTED:[/color] Install recommended mods in the section below
[*]ENJOY!!
[/list]
[center][heading][size=+2][color=yellow][u]Recommended mods:[/u][/color][/size][/heading][/center]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12808]Creepy Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12454]Dark Dungeons for ENB[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=736]Interior and Dungeon Fog Remover[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9930]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2616]Sun and Cloud textures[/url]
[/list]
[center][heading][size=+2][color=cyan][u]Credits and Thanks[/u][/color][/size][/heading][/center]
[color=yellow][b]Boris Vorontsov[/b][/color] -Almighty creator of ENBSeries
[color=yellow][b]HeliosDoubleSix[/b][/color] -Creator of the awesome HD6 shader code
[color=yellow][b]MATSO[/b][/color] -Creator of the superb Depth of Field code

[b]Thank you for your support! If you like please [color=yellow]ENDORSE![/color] and feel free to leave your thoughts and user screens or any other feedback :)[/b]
author: joey4track
